page.title: 13OUR HOLIDAYS
page.content: I like holidays where there are lots of things to do.Last year we went to the Lake District.We stayed in chalets in the woods by Lake Windermere.There was a wide choice of activities which included rock climbing and absailing,topper sailing,dinghy sailing and canoeing in Kayaks and Canadians.In the evenings there were talks and crafts to try.I went to a talk about owls.The man who came to talk to us brought a barn owl,a tawny owl,an eagle owl and some others. One evening there was an overnight bivouak. We enjoyed this holiday the most.It is good to get away from home on holiday.
